ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 16 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Canon EOS 5D Mark III Digital SLR Camera with EF 24-70mm f/4.0L IS USM Lens + <2> Canon Speedlite 320EX Flash + <3> Canon 200DG DSLR Camera Case + <4> Transcend 64GB SDXC 10 Card +
<5> Spare LP-E6 Battery + <6> Battery Charger for LP-E6 + <7> PD 77mm (UV/CPL/ND8) Filters + <8> RC-6 Shutter Remote Control +
<9> Canon 62-inch Deluxe Tripod + <10> Canon Optical Cleaning Kit + <11> PD Spudz Microfiber Cloth + <12> PD Deluxe Hurricane Blower +
<13> PD HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable + <14> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <15> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <16> LCD Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS 5D Mark III Digital SLR Camera with EF 24-70mm f/4.0L IS USM Lens with 64GB Card + Case + 320EX LED Flash + Battery & Charger + Tripod + Filter Kit
